question: The UNIX sytem uses a/an ________ stored at the beginning of a some files to indicate roughly the type of file
options: ['a) identifier', 'b) extension', 'c) virtual number', 'd) magic number']

question: The larger the block size, the ______ the internal fragmentation
options: ['a) greater', 'b) lesser', 'c) same', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: In the sequential access method, information in the file is processed ____________
options: ['a) one disk after the other, record access doesnt matter', 'b) one record after the other', 'c) one text document after the other', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) one disk after the other, record access doesnt matter
option2: b) one record after the other
option3: c) one text document after the other

question: Sequential access method ______  on random access devices
options: ['a) works well', 'b) doesnt work well', 'c) maybe works well and doesnt work well', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option3: c) maybe works well and doesnt work well

question: The direct access method is based on a ______ model of a file, as _____ allow random access to any file block
options: ['a) magnetic tape, magnetic tapes', 'b) tape, tapes', 'c) disk, disks', 'd) all of the mentioned']

question: For a direct access file ____________
options: ['a) there are restrictions on the order of reading and writing', 'b) there are no restrictions on the order of reading and writing', 'c) access is restricted permission wise', 'd) access is not restricted permission wise']
option1: a) there are restrictions on the order of reading and writing
option2: b) there are no restrictions on the order of reading and writing
option3: c) access is restricted permission wise
option4: d) access is not restricted permission wise

question: A relative block number is an index relative to ____________
options: ['a) the beginning of the file', 'b) the end of the file', 'c) the last written position in file', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) the beginning of the file
option2: b) the end of the file
option3: c) the last written position in file

question: The index contains ____________
options: ['a) names of all contents of file', 'b) pointers to each page', 'c) pointers to the various blocks', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) names of all contents of file
option3: c) pointers to the various blocks

question: For large files, when the index itself becomes too large to be kept in memory?
options: ['a) index is called', 'b) an index is created for the index file', 'c) secondary index files are created', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option2: b) an index is created for the index file
option3: c) secondary index files are created
